# 𓅬 goose

𓅬 𓅭 𓅾 󳳈 󳳉 󳳊 󳳋 󳳌 󳳍 󳳎 󳳏 󳶞 󳶟 󳶠 󳶡 󳶢 󳶣 󳶤 󳶥 󳶦

𓅾

𓅭𓇳 gens ⋍ güne 𓇳 ⋍ gander / Gans Gänse goose geese

𒌋𒋢 ᵍu-su ⇔ 𒆳𒆪 kur-ku goose 𓅬 𓅾

𒊻 ᵍUS ᵍUZ = 𒄷𒊺 ᵍHU-ŠE goose 𓅾 (always reverse) 𒊻 SHE-HU = wild duck

𒍖 ᵍuz fisH? goose? duck : bat ⋍ 𒁁 BÀD “blood” uš₂ ēshar असृज् asṛj *h₁ésh₂r̥

goose < goorge :

𒆳𒄄𒄷 kur-gi₄ mušen kurgi "goose" 𒆳𒄀𒄷 kur-gi mušen kurgi "goose" 𒆳𒄃𒄷 kur-gi16 mušen kurgi "goose"

𒈬 ĜU 𒄑 GEŠ 𒄷𒋛 "wood" <> goose
